    • Method Detail

      • commandLoop

        public void commandLoop()
                 throws CliRunnerException
        Reads and executes commands until the quit flag is set
        Throws:
        CliRunnerException - unhandled exception

      • quit

        public void quit()
        Signals that the command loop should terminate instead of reading another command

      • isCliQuit

        protected boolean isCliQuit()
        Returns:
        quit flag - if true, command loop will terminate instead of reading the next command

      • promptUser

        protected void promptUser()
        Issue command prompt

      • getCommandline

        protected java.lang.String getCommandline()
        Issue command prompt and read the next command line from the user or the input stream
        Returns:
        next command line from input or null if end of input or error while reading input

      • preprocessCommandline

        protected java.lang.String preprocessCommandline(java.lang.String commandLine)
        Parameters:
        commandLine - "raw" command line, before preprocessing
        Returns:
        "final" command line to be executed by CLI dispatcher, or null if command was "swallowed" by pre-processor
